Html:
I see that Word 2010 supports the format "quote", "footnote" and "bibliography". But I can not find how to use the format "footnote" '
How should I do?

 

Citation: (CORREA DE OLIVEITA, 2008)

Footnote: Correa de Oliveira, A escalada na Igreja, 2008, pp. 4-14.

Bibliographie: CORREA DE OLIVEIRA, Plinio. A escalada na Igreja. Vozes: Pretropolis, 2008.

Where do you see that? I don't have a version of Word 2010 around at the moment but as far as I remember, Word 2010 does not support footnote citations.

Word 2008 for Mac and Word 2011 for Mac do support footnote citations (one time none-updatable). Perhaps you are confusing with those versions.
